sn22.89:1.1: Ekam samayam sambahula thera bhikkhu kosambiyam viharanti ghositarame.
sn22.89:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma khemako badarikarame viharati abadhiko dukkhito balhagilano.
sn22.89:1.3: Atha kho thera bhikkhu sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthita ayasmantam dasakam amantesum:
sn22.89:1.4: “ehi tvam, avuso dasaka, yena khemako bhikkhu tenupasankama; upasankamitva khemakam bhikkhum evam vadehi:
sn22.89:1.6: kacci te, avuso, khamaniyam, kacci yapaniyam, kacci dukkha vedana patikkamanti no abhikkamanti, patikkamosanam pannayati no abhikkamo’”ti?
sn22.89:1.7: “Evamavuso”ti kho ayasma dasako theranam bhikkhunam patissutva yenayasma khemako tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam khemakam etadavoca:
sn22.89:1.10: “Na me, avuso, khamaniyam na yapaniyam …pe… abhikkamosanam pannayati no patikkamo”ti.
sn22.89:2.1: Atha kho ayasma dasako yena thera bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva there bhikkhu etadavoca:
sn22.89:2.3: ‘na me, avuso, khamaniyam …pe… abhikkamosanam pannayati no patikkamo’”ti.
sn22.89:2.4: “Ehi tvam, avuso dasaka, yena khemako bhikkhu tenupasankama; upasankamitva khemakam bhikkhum evam vadehi:
sn22.89:2.6: pancime, avuso, upadanakkhandha vutta bhagavata, seyyathidam—
sn22.89:2.8: Imesu ayasma khemako pancasu upadanakkhandhesu kinci attam va attaniyam va samanupassati’”ti?
sn22.89:3.1: “Evamavuso”ti kho ayasma dasako theranam bhikkhunam patissutva yenayasma khemako tenupasankami; upasankamitva …pe…
sn22.89:3.5: Imesu ayasma khemako pancasu upadanakkhandhesu kinci attam va attaniyam va samanupassati”ti?
sn22.89:3.8: Imesu khvaham, avuso, pancasu upadanakkhandhesu na kinci attam va attaniyam va samanupassami”ti.
sn22.89:4.1: Atha kho ayasma dasako yena thera bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva there bhikkhu etadavoca:
sn22.89:4.5: Imesu khvaham, avuso, pancasu upadanakkhandhesu na kinci attam va attaniyam va samanupassami’”ti.
sn22.89:4.6: “Ehi tvam, avuso dasaka, yena khemako bhikkhu tenupasankama; upasankamitva khemakam bhikkhum evam vadehi:
sn22.89:4.8: pancime, avuso, upadanakkhandha vutta bhagavata, seyyathidam—
sn22.89:4.10: No ce kirayasma khemako imesu pancasu upadanakkhandhesu kinci attam va attaniyam va samanupassati.
sn22.89:5.1: “Evamavuso”ti kho ayasma dasako theranam bhikkhunam patissutva yenayasma khemako …pe…
sn22.89:5.5: no ce kirayasma khemako imesu pancasu upadanakkhandhesu kinci attam va attaniyam va samanupassati, tenahayasma khemako araham khinasavo”ti.
sn22.89:5.8: Imesu khvaham, avuso, pancasu upadanakkhandhesu na kinci attam va attaniyam va samanupassami, na camhi araham khinasavo;
sn22.89:5.9: api ca me, avuso, pancasu upadanakkhandhesu ‘asmi’ti adhigatam, ‘ayamahamasmi’ti na ca samanupassami”ti.
sn22.89:6.1: Atha kho ayasma dasako yena thera bhikkhu …pe…
sn22.89:6.4: pancime, avuso, upadanakkhandha vutta bhagavata, seyyathidam—
sn22.89:6.6: Imesu khvaham, avuso, pancasu upadanakkhandhesu na kinci attam va attaniyam va samanupassami, na camhi araham khinasavo;
sn22.89:6.7: api ca me, avuso, pancasu upadanakkhandhesu ‘asmi’ti adhigatam, ‘ayamahamasmi’ti na ca samanupassami”ti.
sn22.89:7.1: “Ehi tvam, avuso dasaka, yena khemako bhikkhu tenupasankama; upasankamitva khemakam bhikkhum evam vadehi:
sn22.89:7.3: yametam, avuso khemaka, asmiti vadesi, kimetam asmiti vadesi?
sn22.89:7.4: Rupam asmiti vadesi, annatra rupa asmiti vadesi,
sn22.89:7.8: vinnanam asmiti vadesi, annatra vinnana asmiti vadesi.
sn22.89:7.9: Yametam, avuso khemaka, asmiti vadesi. Kimetam asmiti vadesi’”ti?
sn22.89:8.1: “Evamavuso”ti kho ayasma dasako theranam bhikkhunam patissutva yenayasma khemako tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam khemakam etadavoca—
sn22.89:8.9: Yametam, avuso khemaka, ‘asmi’ti vadesi, kimetam ‘asmi’ti vadesi”ti?
sn22.89:9.1: Atha kho ayasma khemako dandamolubbha yena thera bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva therehi bhikkhuhi saddhim sammodi.
sn22.89:9.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam khemakam thera bhikkhu etadavocum:
sn22.89:9.9: Yametam, avuso khemaka, ‘asmi’ti vadesi, kimetam ‘asmi’ti vadesi”ti?
sn22.89:9.10: “Na khvaham, avuso, rupam ‘asmi’ti vadami; napi annatra rupa ‘asmi’ti vadami.
sn22.89:9.14: na vinnanam ‘asmi’ti vadami; napi annatra vinnana ‘asmi’ti vadami.
sn22.89:9.15: Api ca me, avuso, pancasu upadanakkhandhesu ‘asmi’ti adhigatam ‘ayamahamasmi’ti na ca samanupassami.
sn22.89:10.1: Seyyathapi, avuso, uppalassa va padumassa va pundarikassa va gandho.
sn22.89:10.2: Yo nu kho evam vadeyya: ‘pattassa gandho’ti va ‘vannassa gandho’ti va ‘kinjakkhassa gandho’ti va samma nu kho so vadamano vadeyya”ti?
sn22.89:10.5: “‘Pupphassa gandho’ti kho, avuso, samma byakaramano byakareyya”ti.
sn22.89:10.6: “Evameva khvaham, avuso, na rupam ‘asmi’ti vadami, napi annatra rupa ‘asmi’ti vadami.
sn22.89:10.10: na vinnanam ‘asmi’ti vadami, napi annatra vinnana ‘asmi’ti vadami.
sn22.89:10.11: Api ca me, avuso, pancasu upadanakkhandhesu ‘asmi’ti adhigatam ‘ayamahamasmi’ti na ca samanupassami.
sn22.89:11.1: Kincapi, avuso, ariyasavakassa pancorambhagiyani samyojanani pahinani bhavanti, atha khvassa hoti: ‘yo ca pancasu upadanakkhandhesu anusahagato asmiti mano, asmiti chando, asmiti anusayo asamuhato.
sn22.89:11.2: So aparena samayena pancasu upadanakkhandhesu udayabbayanupassi viharati—
sn22.89:11.3: iti rupam, iti rupassa samudayo, iti rupassa atthangamo;
sn22.89:11.7: iti vinnanam, iti vinnanassa samudayo, iti vinnanassa atthangamo’ti.
sn22.89:11.8: Tassimesu pancasu upadanakkhandhesu udayabbayanupassino viharato yopissa hoti pancasu upadanakkhandhesu anusahagato ‘asmi’ti, mano ‘asmi’ti, chando ‘asmi’ti anusayo asamuhato, sopi samugghatam gacchati.
sn22.89:12.1: Seyyathapi, avuso, vattham sankilittham malaggahitam. Tamenam samika rajakassa anupadajjum.
sn22.89:12.2: Tamenam rajako use va khare va gomaye va sammadditva acche udake vikkhaleti.
sn22.89:12.3: Kincapi tam hoti vattham parisuddham pariyodatam, atha khvassa hoti yeva anusahagato usagandho va kharagandho va gomayagandho va asamuhato.
sn22.89:12.4: Tamenam rajako samikanam deti. Tamenam samika gandhaparibhavite karandake nikkhipanti.
sn22.89:12.5: Yopissa hoti anusahagato usagandho va kharagandho va gomayagandho va asamuhato, sopi samugghatam gacchati.
sn22.89:12.6: Evameva kho, avuso, kincapi ariyasavakassa pancorambhagiyani samyojanani pahinani bhavanti, atha khvassa hoti yeva pancasu upadanakkhandhesu anusahagato ‘asmi’ti, mano ‘asmi’ti, chando ‘asmi’ti anusayo asamuhato.
sn22.89:12.7: So aparena samayena pancasu upadanakkhandhesu udayabbayanupassi viharati.
sn22.89:12.8: ‘Iti rupam, iti rupassa samudayo, iti rupassa atthangamo;
sn22.89:12.12: iti vinnanam, iti vinnanassa samudayo, iti vinnanassa atthangamo’ti.
sn22.89:12.13: Tassa imesu pancasu upadanakkhandhesu udayabbayanupassino viharato yopissa hoti pancasu upadanakkhandhesu anusahagato ‘asmi’ti, mano ‘asmi’ti, chando ‘asmi’ti anusayo asamuhato, sopi samugghatam gacchati”ti.
sn22.89:13.1: Evam vutte, thera bhikkhu ayasmantam khemakam etadavocum:
sn22.89:13.2: “na kho mayam ayasmantam khemakam vihesapekha pucchimha, api cayasma khemako pahosi tassa bhagavato sasanam vittharena acikkhitum desetum pannapetum patthapetum vivaritum vibhajitum uttanikatum.
sn22.89:13.3: Tayidam ayasmata khemakena tassa bhagavato sasanam vittharena acikkhitam desitam pannapitam patthapitam vivaritam vibhajitam uttanikatan”ti.
sn22.89:14.2: Attamana thera bhikkhu ayasmato khemakassa bhasitam abhinandum.
sn22.89:14.3: Imasminca pana veyyakaranasmim bhannamane satthimattanam theranam bhikkhunam anupadaya asavehi cittani vimuccimsu, ayasmato khemakassa cati.
